channel.title: Donator only

item.title: Donator only
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

[508] CODEUSA

ok instead of adding:

if (wearId == 4375 && p.Donator == 0) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “[<col=0000ff>Server] Donator Only.”);
return;
}

i would like to make a string like this:

String[] Donator = {“null”, “Statius”, “Vesta”, “Morrigan”, “Zuriel”, “Corrupt”};
for (String s : Donator) {
if (itemName.contains(s)) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You Need To Be A Donator”);
return;
}
}

any help? thanks.

Read full topic
